item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Miraculous World: New York - United Heroez (2020) REPACK 1080p Disney+ WEB-DL DDP5.1 H.264-LADYBUG
item.description:
Miraculous World: New York - United HeroeZ

Synopsis:
Marinette's class goes on a trip to New York, the city of superheroes, for French American Friendship Week, but the super heroes living there find themselves in need of help while there.
